text: Arnold Riegger (July 8, 1920 – July 6, 1996) was an American sports shooter. He competed in the trap event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:1996 deaths Category:American male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of the United States Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:People from Bothell, Washington
title: Arnold Riegger
